About the Event:
The International Trade Fair for Auto Maintenance Technology and Equipment

Get connected with the the automotive maintenance and repair sectors at the leading trade fair Auto Maintenance and Repair Expo (AMR) in Beijing. As a premium business meeting place for the industry, dealership trade and maintenance and repair segment, it provides a major platform for business and technological knowledge transfer.

https://auto-maintenance.cn.messefrankfurt.com/beijing/en/facts-figures.html
